segments.advisor_message: Alright, let's get started with some basics. Can you tell me your name please?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, so I'm, um, my name's John, John Smith, you know? But, mostly, folks just call me Johnny.

segments.advisor_message: Thanks, Johnny! And just to clarify, do you have a middle name you want to include?
segments.client_message: Oh, um, not really. I don’t use a middle name, so just stick with John Smith.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! So, when we move forward, I'll just use John Smith for your records. Next, can we go over your date of birth?
segments.client_message: Yeah, sure! It's, uh, the 15th of March, nineteen eighty-five. Just, uh, to let you know, yeah?
